reasons_to_visit.details: Traditional Czech Easter markets in Old Town Square featuring local crafts, Easter decorations, and seasonal treats like mazanec (Easter bread).
Ještěd Mountain offers spectacular spring views as snow melts and the landscape awakens, perfect for hiking and photography.
Liberec Botanical Garden comes alive with spring flowers and the butterfly house is at peak activity, creating a beautiful natural escape.
Mild temperatures (8-16°C) and increasing sunshine make April ideal for outdoor activities and exploring the city's parks and mountain trails.
Spring cultural events and exhibitions at the Regional Gallery and Liberec Castle showcase local art and history.

reasons_to_avoid.details: April can bring frequent rain showers requiring flexible outdoor planning and rain gear, especially for mountain activities.
Easter markets and celebrations can be very crowded, especially on weekends and holidays.
Accommodation and dining prices begin rising as tourist season approaches.

activities: Easter market shopping and traditional celebrations
Ještěd Mountain hiking and cable car rides

special_events.description: Traditional Czech Easter markets with crafts, decorations, and local food
Traditional Czech Easter traditions including egg painting and willow whipping (pomlázka)
Cultural events and exhibitions celebrating spring and local traditions

local_tips: Visit Easter markets early in the morning to avoid crowds
Check weather before planning mountain activities on Ještěd
Book restaurants in advance during Easter period
Combine Ještěd Tower visit with Easter market shopping
Don't miss the butterfly house at the Botanical Garden
Try traditional Easter bread (mazanec) at local bakeries
